metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6810 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: After a website had entered fullscreen mode, it could have used apreviously opened popup to obscure the notification that indicates thebrowser is in fullscreen mode. Combined with spoofing the browser chrome,this could have led to confusing the user about the current origin of thepage and credential theft or other attacks. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 74.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
